variable.name: CCStype
variable.description: The CCS classification assignment as described by Ay, H. et al. An evidence-based causative classification system for acute ischemic stroke. Ann Neurol 58, 688-697 (PMID: 16240340)

variable.name: CCSevidence
variable.description: The CCS evidence designation as described by Ay, H. et al. An evidence-based causative classification system for acute ischemic stroke. Ann Neurol 58, 688-697 (PMID: 16240340)

variable.name: firstStroke
variable.description: Is the index stroke event the first stroke for the individual? An index stroke is the stroke that was used to qualify the individual for the study.

variable.name: numberOfStrokes
variable.description: For cases, the number of strokes. If the index event is the first stroke, enter 1. For controls enter 0. Leave blank if unknown. According to the WHO definition and/or a focal area of infarction seen on CT or MRI imaging with symptoms that correlate. Silent infarction and TIA will not count.

variable.name: TOAST
variable.description: The TOAST subtype classification for cases only. TOAST classification as defined by Adams et. al., Stroke 1993;24;35-41; (PMID: 7678184). Options 6, 7, and 8 were used whenever possible rather than option 5 if the amount of detail was known.
variable.value: Stroke of undetermined etiology with appropriate workup
Stroke of undetermined etiology because 2 or more causes were identified
Stroke of undetermined etiology because of insufficient workup

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age at first stroke for cases; age at enrollment for controls

variable.name: race
variable.value: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

variable.name: hypertension
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have hypertension or high blood pressure?

variable.name: diabetesMellitus
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have diabetes mellitus?

variable.name: atrialFibrillation
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have atrial fibrillation?

variable.name: CAD
variable.description: Coronary artery disease defined as 'yes' for the presence of an MI, CABG or stent, 'no', otherwise.

variable.name: smokingStatus
variable.description: 'CURRENT' defined as cigarette smoking within last 30 days, 'FORMER' defined as more than 100 cigarettes in one's lifetime but no smoking within the last 30 days; 'NEVER' defined as less than 100 cigarettes smoked in one's lifetime.
